name: You can do it [Canceled]
description:
Cnaceled 

This game is made on Construct 3 until I meet Gdevelop 5 with better features like Z order (Construct 3 is locked this option)

You can do it is a gameboy style game.

Help him find the exit.

Made whit Construct 3.

v1.2 Better player animations and new game boy scren screen(Look ther screenshot).

v1.4 Add double jump power up, spike, save flag, working "new?" game button and spider.

v1.6 Add water, player new look and small 10x10 -> 9x9 pixel, water, locked door, key (final version) and a secret spider.

Note the black - withe boxs is demo end.
